data.eml:eml: Taxonomy and immature stages of the Platystomatidae (Diptera: Tephritoidea) of Israel

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bodner, L., Freidberg, A. (2016): Taxonomy and immature stages of the Platystomatidae (Diptera: Tephritoidea) of Israel. Zootaxa 4171 (2): 201-245, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4171.2.1
